text: Lovers and Liars (Viaggio con Anita) is a 1979 Italian French comedy movie directed by Mario Monicelli and starring Goldie Hawn, Giancarlo Giannini, Claudine Auger, Aurore Clément, Laura Betti, Andréa Ferréol. ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Mario Monicelli
title: Lovers and Liars
